alert.note: Alert for Howard; Mitchell (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 4:43PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Mitchell and northwestern Howard Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 442 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Riceville, or 12 miles east of Osage, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Elma around 445 PM CDT. Riceville around 450 PM CDT. Lime Springs around 515 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Lylahs Marsh County Park, Saratoga, Maple Leaf, Brownville, Hayden Prairie, Chester and Davis Corners. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
